entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending in the evening then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
